channel.title: Template Design on Laura Kalbag
channel.description: Recent content in Template Design on Laura Kalbag

item.title: Digital Arts: Designing for the unknown
item.description: Last week, Craig Grannell asked me some questions about designing for the unknown. The result was a really fantastic article called Designing for the unknown: how to design templates and frameworks, and has contributions from some really smart people. The title image is from my writeup of the Default Perch Theme project I did with Perch.
